tooltip.tinkers_advanced.exchanger1: Allow interactions between tool placed inside and other blocks.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.exchanger3: R-Click to insert tool ,R-Click with tool handle to toggle energy ejection.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.advanced_alloye: Works similar as Scorched Alloyer (But without GUI).
Utilizes smeltery drains instead of smeltery tanks.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.rose_gold_casti: Cooling speed x%2$s when original cooling speed <%1$ss. Otherwise Cooling speed x%3$s.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.fuel_engraver1: Can apply modifiers on the lens to the tool you are crafting consuming melting fuel.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.fuel_engraver2: Requires Tinker's Station(Or anvil) on 2 blocks below. R-Click at the bottom to place Fuel Lens.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.lens_warn2: Engraving process might not be fully completed.
message.tinkers_advanced.no_tinkers_stat: No Tinker's Station at 2 blocks below.
